actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A resolution relative to flood protection in the Trinity River Basin, Texas.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to conduct basinwide examinations and surveys for flood protection, environmental enhancement, and related purposes for the Trinity River Basin, Texas, with specific attention to those areas suffering losses in the floods of 1990.

titles.title: A resolution relative to flood protection in the Trinity River Basin, Texas.
